fields.name: Promoter %
fields.formula:
round(if(field('Number of surveys') > 0,
100 / field('Number of surveys') * field('Promoter'), 0),0)

fields.name: Detractor %
fields.formula:
round(if(field('Number of surveys') > 0,
100 / field('Number of surveys') * field('Detractor'), 0),0)

fields.name: Promoters %
fields.formula:
round(if(field('Number of surveys') > 0,
100 / field('Number of surveys') * field('Promoters'), 0),0)

fields.name: Detractors %
fields.formula:
round(if(field('Number of surveys') > 0,
(100 / field('Number of surveys')) * field('Detractors'), 0),0)

rows.field_17768: Streaming data storage and analytics service that automatically scales.

Database solutions provided by Centy Cloud.
Scalable database solutions available within the Forest Cloud.
